#summary Attribute configuration

= Attributes =
In the configuration file, you can define what attributes, that can be used for generation Attribute Release Policies. The attributes are defined in the option `attributes`.

= Default ARP = 
You can define a default ARP for those entities, that do not have an ARP selected. This is defined in the option `entity.defaultarp`. 

Example on configuring the `entity.defaultarp`

{{{
'entity.defaultarp' => array(
    'eduPersonTargetdID',
    'mail',
),
}}}
